content: A solution of 90 mg (0.3 mmol) of K3[Cu(CN)4] in 30 mL H2O was added with gentle stirring to a solution of 189 mg (0.95 mmol) of Me3SnCl in 10 mL H2O and 0.15 mL (1 mmol) of ethyl isonicotinate (EIN) in 30 mL acetonitrile. After 1 week yellow needle crystals started to grow from the initially clear solution. After filtration, washing with small quantity of cold H2O and acetonitrile and drying over night, 46 mg (60.8% based on K3[Cu(CN)4] of yellow crystals were obtained. All attempts to synthesize 1 at room temperature in absence of Me3SnCl have thus far been unsuccessful.
clean_text:
Synthesis of [CuCN⋅EIN] (1)

A solution of 90 mg (0.3 mmol) of K3[Cu(CN)4] in 30 mL H2O was added with gentle stirring to a solution of 189 mg (0.95 mmol) of Me3SnCl in 10 mL H2O and 0.15 mL (1 mmol) of ethyl isonicotinate (EIN) in 30 mL acetonitrile. After 1 week yellow needle crystals started to grow from the initially clear solution. After filtration, washing with small quantity of cold H2O and acetonitrile and drying over night, 46 mg (60.8% based on K3[Cu(CN)4] of yellow crystals were obtained. All attempts to synthesize 1 at room temperature in absence of Me3SnCl have thus far been unsuccessful.
